name: VisualAgent.generate_diagram
description: Generates architecture or flow diagrams for the blog content. This helps visualize concepts, workflows, or system architectures mentioned in the transcript/blog.

context_text.description: The text context from the blog or transcript that describes what diagram needs to be created

diagram_type.description: The type of diagram to generate (e.g., 'architecture', 'flow', 'sequence', 'er-diagram', 'mindmap')
